text: On a hill above the city is an old CATHEDRAL. The night i spooky, with harsh shadows playing across the cobblestone and medieval walls. A NERVOUS YOUNG HACKER makes his way down an alley. There is a DOOR at the end of the alley. MUSIC can be fai heard from inside.

High above the street an INTRUDER DRESSED ALL IN BLACK sp from the roof. He's watching with NIGHT VISION GOGGLES. He pulls out a CROSSBOW and FIRES. A BOLT flies, trailing CABLE. THUNK! It sticks into the alley wall below.

As he passes by the ominous Cathedral, the Hacker spins,  sure he's heard something. But there's nothing there. He continues on. Then the Intruder comes sliding down the ZIP-LINE from ab WHAM! He kicks the Hacker into the wall, knocking him out The Intruder pulls off his mask, revealing the chiseled  features of a dashing BRITISH SECRET AGENT. His name is  STERLING.
I hate to drop in unexpectedly.

Sterling searches the Hacker and pulls a SMALL BLACK CASE from his coat. Inside the case is a DATA CHIP. Sterling t it away. Sterling unzips his black jumpsuit, revealing a crisp TUX underneath. He pulls out CAR KEYS. In a quick insert we s the "ASTON-MARTIN" LOGO. As he strolls back out the alley, he HEARS something and  flattens against the wall. A BLACKED OUT SUV screeches to a stop, blocking his exit. The SUV's HEADLIGHTS illuminate the slumped Hacker. BAD GUYS get out to investigate, pulling out weapons. Cornered, Sterling heads deeper into the alley, staying i the shadows. He gets to that DOOR the Hacker was heading  towards. As he PICKS THE LOCK Sterling can hear MUSIC from inside. smooths his hair and prepares to "blend in" with the crow

Sterling comes through the door and his face falls. He's  stepped into a loud METAL CONCERT. We see a GO-GO DANCER in LATEX. Onstage is RAMMSTEIN, a  bizarre German industrial-metal band. The tattooed YOUNG CROWD slam dances and swings glo-stix  over their heads. Some wear rubber BRAIN SKULLCAPS outfit with fiber optic lights. It's a sea of SPIKED HAIR and BO OUTFITS. Sterling squares his jaw and starts pushing through the c With his tuxedo he sticks out like a penguin in a chicken coop. ON THE BALCONY ABOVE THE CROWD stands a wild haired young GANGSTER with PIERCED BROWS. With him is a STREET-TOUGH G with multi-colored hair. They look like a post-Apocalypti Bonnie & Clyde. They are YORGI and PETRA. Yorgi checks his watch. His delivery is late. Then his CE PHONE rings. He's getting the news from outside. He looks down, spots Sterling amidst the moshing crowd. W that look, that tux, there's no mistaking what he is. They make EYE CONTACT and Sterling gives a little nod. Yorgi calmly issues orders into his phone. Immediately VIKTOR starts moving in Sterling's direction. Viktor is huge, with a MOHAWK and a six-inch GOATEE. Sterling sees him advancing and makes for the exit, pushi through the freaky crowd.
Sterling's ASTON-MARTIN VANTAGE screeches away from the c

Sterling is at the wheel of his spy car. He plugs the DAT CHIP into the dash and punches buttons. A computer screen says "DATA DOWNLOADING". He sees a BLACKED-OUT SUV racing up behind him. He accelerates and hits a SWITCH. ARMORED PLATING slides up over the rear window.

The SUV is right behind him. Viktor rolls down the passen window, readies his PISTOL. The rear bumper of the spy car opens. SMOKE BOMBS drop ou They explode in MASSIVE CLOUDS, obscuring the narrow, str Sterling skids around a corner. The blinded bad guys drive straight into a STOREFRONT. Gl and merchandise flies as the SUV gets stuck. The Aston-Martin rounds another corner and slides to a st Blocking the road ahead are two more SUV's. A MOTORCYCLE slides to a stop in front of them. The rider ANDERS, a leather clad biker who looks half Viking. Anders pulls out a SILENCED SUB-MACHINE GUN and starts  BLASTING. BULLETS SLAM into the Aston-Martin, cracking the bullet-p glass, shattering headlights, and BLOWING OUT THE FRONT T Sterling jams it into reverse and backs around the corner the RIMS.

Sterling notices an ERROR MESSAGE now flashing on his com screen: "TRANSMISSION ERROR: - DATA PARTIALLY SENT". Sterling looks around desperately. Somehow he's got to ge this data out of here. Straight ahead is the RIVER. Chugging up the river: a PAR BARGE. PARTYGOERS in formal attire dance to an orchestra. A SWIM POOL is in the middle of the deck for a perfect water lan
Time for a slow boat to China.
He hits a BUTTON.

The rear license plate folds down, revealing a ROCKET ENG Flames spew as he jams down the accelerator. Sterling is pushed back into his seat by the G-forces. SPARKS fly from the rims as he skips across the pavement ever increasing speed. Anders FIRES with his gun, but Sterling is getting away! But then KIRILL steps around the corner. He's academic  looking, a CHAIN SMOKING intellectual with COKE-BOTTLE  GLASSES. He's also a highly proficient and cold-blooded  SNIPER. Kirill puts his lit cigarette behind his ear and unslings SURFACE-TO-AIR MISSILE LAUNCHER from his shoulder. The Aston-Martin reaches the riverbank and goes AIRBORNE. ROCKETS through the air towards the party barge. We see the car REFLECTED in Kirill's glasses as he AIMS. On a little SCREEN we see the missile launcher HOME IN on the HEAT SOURCE of the jet engine. The missile locks-in and FIRES... HEATSEEKER P.O.V. - we see a GREEN CAR with all its hot s GLOWING RED. Camera ROARS towards the flying car.
Sterling sees the missile streaking at him.
Oh bloody hell!

WHOOMPH! The Aston-Martin EXPLODES in mid-air. Partygoers shriek as the AXLE and FLAMING RIMS rain down the deck. Kirill takes the cigarette from his ear, PUFFS IT. Finally, Sterling's flaming BOW TIE flutters down and lan on a LEAPING SALMON ICE-SCULPTURE above a tantalizing SEA BUFFET.

A STRAFING SHOT over the city. We make a sudden left turn and SPEED OUT OF TOWN. We shoot over to the BLUE RIDGE MOUNTAINS of VIRGINIA. In the middle of NOWHERE we dive towards a COMPLEX OF BLACK  BUILDINGS.

Inside it's modern, cold and high tech. An elevator COUNT DOWN to a deep basement level. The doors open and a TALL MAN man with a PROSTHETIC LEG  strides down the empty hall. AGENT GIBBONS is African- American, a battle-scarred WARRIOR. Even with a limp he l sturdy, confident, deadly. At the end of the hall is a METAL DOOR.

Gibbons walks into the INFORMATION ROOM of the NATIONAL  SECURITY AGENCY (NSA). There are WORLD MAPS, SATELLITE IM on COMPUTER SCREENS, TECHIES monitoring everything. If a nuclear war broke out, you could run the country fro down here. Gibbons takes an elevator up.

The office is expensive yet devoid of personality, reflec the shadowy nature of it's owner. One wall is GLASS, look down on the information room. SAM TANNICK, grizzled NSA c looks down at the activity below.
Come.
Gibbons enters, stands by the desk.
Evening, Sam.
Sam remains in shadow.
What do you have?
Not a whole helluva lot. His final  transmission was mangled. About  something or someone called "Ahab".  Whatever it is, it cost him his life.
He was the best there was. That makes  three agents lost.
They're ruthless and they have a lot  of firepower. It's only a matter of  time before they figure out how to  deploy Silent Night. Then we're gonna  have a catastrophe on our hands.
Silent Night in the hands of a bunch  of impertinent cowboys
We're gonna have to step in, Sam.  Those CIA boys couldn't find a clown  in a field of cactus. Let me take  care of it.
How will you fix it?
I'll go in with a team. But first  I'm going to need some intel. I'll  have to put someone inside, someone  new, someone they won't see coming.  One of their own.
So you'll dredge the bottom again.  You've done that before. The results  were... uneven.
You wanna find out about rats, ask a  rat. I've had my people put together  a talent pool. I downloaded it to  your desktop.
Gibbons snaps on the giant FLATSCREEN on Sam's desk. He s cycling through PHOTO AFTER PHOTO of TOUGH LOOKING MEN.
The usual prospects. Convicts,  contract killers, murde...
The scum of the Earth.
But programmable. And expendable.
I've seen enough. Turn it off.
Gibbons clicks off the screen.
They're degenerates. There's not a  man in there that would give a damn  if the Chinese took over.
That's exactly why we need them.
Sam sighs, stares out at the information room.
Get these "scum", Mr. Gibbons, bring  them in. Test them. Train them. Find  your man.

The huge ARCO TOWER rises up towards a moonlit sky. We see ACCOMPLICE #1 (TRAVIS PASTRANA) sneak up and take  position behind a FOUNTAIN. ACCOMPLICE #2 (CAREY HART) sneaks across a roof and takes position overlooking the fountain position of #1. ACCOMPLICE #3 (DAVE MIRRA) takes up position in the secon story window of a FLOPHOUSE HOTEL down the street. A MESSENGER (BOB BURNQUIST) skates up to the front of the skyscraper with a PACKAGE. He gets the attention of the  SECURITY GUARD inside. The Security Guard unlocks the doo and lets him in. Just then a VAN pulls up and ACCOMPLICES #4 (SHAUN PALMER and #5 (MAT HOFFMAN) hop out. They open up the back and a BICYCLE is rolled out of the back by a MAN IN A HOODED JA Jacket Man rolls the bike to the skyscraper and enters th lobby.
The Security Guard is checking his computer.
Crump... I'm sorry, no one by that  name.
K The Guard glances up as Jacket Man gets into an ELEVATO
Hey! You can't go up there!

The Security Guard rushes to intercept him. The Messenger kicks his skateboard out, TRIPPING UP the Security Guard. The Messenger hauls ass out the door. The Security Guard  pulls out his WALKIE-TALKIE.
We've got an intruder in the express  elevator!
The button for "91 - ROOF ACCESS" is lit up. Jacket Man w patiently.

This fancy office is empty for the night. The STAIRWELL D opens and a PLATOON of SECURITY GUARDS rushes in. They ta Up position in front of the elevator doors armed with BIL CLUBS and TASERS. DING! The elevator arrives and the door swings open. But  there's NOBODY INSIDE. One Guard steps forward and suddenly a bicycle SWINGS DOW from the ceiling, TAGGING HIM IN THE FACE. He falls back, TASERING another Guard. Jacket Man drops down onto his bike and pedals through th chaos before the Guards know what hit them. There's a CUR PIECE OF ART in the room, some kind of modern art statue. Jacket Man rides up the artwork like a ramp and does a  TABLETOP AERIAL over a DIVIDER. He hits the ground pedall the Guards hot after him. Jacket Man enters a HUGE OPEN ROOM with a FIELD OF CUBICL in the middle. He bunny hops onto a desk and SLIDES TO A  STOP. He tosses back his hood and we get a good look at h for the first time. He is XANDER CAGE. He's got a shaved head, bizarre TATTOO all over his body and multiple PIERCINGS. He's lean and  heavily cut, even dangerous looking. The Guards charge at him and he HOPS up onto the top of t CUBICLE WALL. This thing is maybe FOUR INCHES WIDE and FI FEET TALL. He pedals across the top of the cubicle wall, the Guards  scrambling after him. Xander bunny hops over one guy's head onto the next set o cubicles and pedals hard. The Guards fall all over themse trying to catch him. At the other end Xander catches air and lands on a CONFER TABLE. He does a WHEELIE across it's length with Guards  closing in. Xander springs up and does a TAIL WHIP, knocking them bac with his rear wheel. He lands and pedals to the stairwell untouched.

Xander bursts out of the stairwell to the top of the TALL BUILDING IN DOWNTOWN LA. He climbs on a RAISED PLATFORM. From here he can drop down onto another level that is str with SATELLITE DISHES and MICROWAVE RELAYS. Guards rush onto the roof and try to corral him. Xander tears off his jacket, revealing a BACKPACK on his  back and VIDEO CAMERA on his chest. He pulls out a ROAD F and SPARKS IT. We see there are SOAKED RAGS tied to his  SPOKES. He LIGHTS THEM with the flare. Then he TOSSES THE FLARE o the building.
The Accomplices see the flare drop. #'s 1, 2 & 3 pull CAM OUT and start filming.

Xander races around the roof like a trapped animal. He ev Security Guards, picking up speed. With Guards right behind, he drops off the TOP PLATFORM a lands on a massive SATELLITE DISH. Using the dish as a ramp, Xander LAUNCHES himself OFF THE TOP OF THE BUILDING. We're talking 90 some stories here. He spins through the air, his bike on fire. He's doing en over end backflips. One... Two... Three... Four... He's looping through space on his bike, a crazy man on a  flaming bike against a backdrop of sleek skyscrapers and  night lights. The stunt is covered by the various Accomplices and Xande own chest camera, in SUPER 8 and DIGITAL VIDEO, from four different angles. Xander ditches the bike, kicking it away from him and plu towards the ground. At the last moment he throws out a "bucket" and his PARAC OPENS.

The bicycle comes flying down and SMASHES into the paveme It bounces a full TWO STORIES back up before coming to re Xander glides down and makes his landing. Accomplices #4 #5 rush out to help him gather up his chute and jump in t van. SIRENS APPROACH as the van makes it's escape. As COP CARS screech up to the skyscraper, one of them RUN OVER the smoking wreckage of the bike.

TITLE SEQUENCE - HARDCORE MUSIC plays as we see a flowing TAPESTRY OF FLORID TATTOOS. SILHOUETTED against this back we see the OUTLINES of NUDE WOMEN riding BMX BIKES in a H PIPE, BLADING ever obstacles, SKY SURFING and doing stree SKATE TRICKS. It's a collision of outlandish imagery that tells you one thing: This ain't your daddy's spy movie.
Xander, now on a MOTORCYCLE, zips through traffic. He's  smiling, leaning it way over on the turns. He's got anoth BACKPACK on his back.
Xander drives his motorcycle into the garage of his build

A FREIGHT ELEVATOR rises up, bringing Xander and his  motorcycle into the loft. There are EXTREME SPORTS ACTION POSTERS on the walls,  MOTORCYCLE PARTS and BARBELLS on the floor, and everywher there's EXTREME SPORTS EQUIPMENT of every description.
Sky, you there? Start packin' cause  we are out of here!
There's a NEATLY FOLDED FLAG hanging in a slightly crooke FRAME on the wall. Xander straightens it as he goes by. He hears her in the sectioned off "bedroom" and heads bac there.
Did I promise you a fat vacation or  what? Get ready to get down in  paradise.
He comes into the bedroom to find SKY, his long-suffering girlfriend. She's a wannabe artist type. She's got SUITCA and BOXES scattered around and she's PACKING.
Hey, you don't need all this just to  go on vacation. Unless this ain't  for going on vacation...
I'm through, Xander.
I can see that. Why?

You run around with maniacs jumping  motorcycles in the desert, you break  36 bones crashing wave runners and  snowboarding off cliffs, all with no  health insurance... It's insane, I  can't take it anymore.
I'm having fun, what's the problem?
You have all this talent, and you  waste it. You won't take a single  endorsement deal. Meanwhile those  other guys have their own video games!  But no, you've got too much  "integrity" for that.
I don't wanna go mersh, you know  that. But hey, if this is about  money...
He opens up the backpack, revealing WADS OF CASH.
I got an advance on the next bootleg.  Let's get out of here, just you and  me. We'll chill out in Bora Bora for  a couple months.
She sorts through the money.
French Polynesia? This wouldn't last  us a week in a cheap hotel. Do you  know how expensive it is down there?
Alright, so I'll get more.
It's not about the money, X! You  never plan for anything. I can't  live like that anymore, I need some  stability.
Well if you're bailing, I guess I'd  better give you your surprise now.
He pulls off his shirt. Pierced through his nipple is a  DIAMOND ENGAGEMENT RING.
What...?
I was gonna wait till the islands,  but...
You're serious?
Of course I'm serious. I bought it,  didn't I?
(shakes her head) This is so typical. I can't believe  you. I've barely seen you for the  last three weeks and now this? Are  you out of your mind?
I don't know. I thought this is what  you wanted. You want stability, here  it is.
You can't just propose to me out of  nowhere. You think that's going to  solve our problems? I'm sorry, X. It  was a kick for a while, but it's  over. You're just not going anywhere.
You're not exactly "going anywhere"  yourself.
You're wrong about that. I'm heading  out that door right now.

She heads towards the front door. Just then the door BLOWS IN. CRASH! -- the windows SMASH IN too. Then the LIGHTS GO OU as STORMTROOPERS in black body armor rush in, weapons dra It's a blur of FLASHLIGHTS, PISTOLS and JACK BOOTS. It's  scary as hell. A professional take-down. They slam Xander against the wall. Just like that it's quiet again. Sky hyperventilates, a g in her face.
She had nothing to do with the tower  jump. She's nobody. I just met her  last night. Tell them. (with meaning) I hardly know you.
The Stormtrooper looks at Sky. She nods. The Stormtrooper take their guns off her. Sky grabs up here stuff. She looks back at Xander.
Keep the ring. It looks better on  you anyways.
She heads out.
God, I hate cops. What's the charges  this time?
The Stormtrooper pulls out a DART GUN and SHOOTS Xander. pulls a CHROME DART from his chest, examines it.
(groggy) You... pussies...
Xander slides to the floor. FADE TO BLACK.
A SIDEWAYS IMAGE: an out of focus COFFEE CREAMER. Xander wakes up with his head on the counter of a DINER. shakes out the cobwebs.
What the hell?
WHIP PAN as a WAITRESS walks by. Xander blinks.
Hey. Where am I? How did I get here?
I don't know, you wandered in ten  minutes ago and put your head down.  I told you we were closing.
Xander looks around, sees a TRUCKER chewing with his mout open. A SALESMAN buried in his NEWSPAPER. Xander gets up. Where the hell is he? He takes a step tow the door.
Want some coffee?
Huh?
The Waitress pours him coffee. QUICK PUSH TO: her hands a shaking.
You alright?
(smiles) Fine, just fine. Come on and sit.  I'll get you something to eat.
Yeah, sure.

Xander sits. When he swigs his coffee, he notices somethi written on his napkin in shaky ballpoint: "S.O.S." What the hell? He looks at the Trucker. The Trucker's sta at the waitress. QUICK PUSH TO: The Trucker has a BULGE  underneath his vest... then PUSH TO: The Salesman's eyes  darting about suspiciously, newspaper pulled up to his no Something is going down... He hears a SLOWED DOWN VOICE and glances back at the Truc who's now fixing him with a DEATH STARE. Xander snaps fro his reverie.
What?
I said, you got a problem, boy?
Problem? No, no problem. You go right  ahead.
With what? I said, go right on ahead  with what?
Whatever, dude.
The Trucker and the Salesman look at each other. Suddenly they jump up. The Trucker pulls a PISTOL from his vest, the Salesman  brandishes the SHOTGUN he had behind the paper. The Waitr cringes.
Alright, nobody make a move! (to Xander) Shoulda walked away when you had the  chance, dumb shit.
Forget him, Buck, let's just do it.
Shut up! (in Xander's face) You keep still or I'm gonna make  damn sure you stop breathing today.  Got that?
Xander stays strangely calm, his senses now fully focused
(shrugs) Alright, "Buck", whatever you say.
The Waitress let's out a whimper.
Keep your gotdam mouth shut and empty  that register! Couldn't just let him  leave, could ya! You know what I'm  gonna do to ya for that? Huh? Do  ya?!

She goes to open the register and knocks a tray of glasse on the floor. Xander springs into action. He CHOPS down on the Trucker's arm and ELBOWS him in the  face. Xander twists the gun out of his hand and kicks his legs from under him. The Salesman pumps on his shotgun, but it seems to be jam
Better shoot me quick.
The Salesman fights with his gun but can't get it to work Xander advances on him.
Too late!
He unleashes with a series of rapid front kicks to the ja The Salesman goes crashing through the kitchen doors. Xander turns to the terrified Waitress.
Alright, bitch, what's going on?
She stares at him, unable to speak. He raises the gun.
Talk! What's the game? Who are you  people?
The front door bell JINGLES. A guy with an impeccably tai suit and a cane hobbles in. It's Gibbons. There a problem Mr. Cage?
Who the hell are you?
The name's Gibbons. You were saying?
What is this place?
Looks like a diner.

Diner, huh? Let me tell you what the  problem is. I wake up drugged to  find what? You've got a "salesman"  over here reading a three week old  newspaper. He's pulling a 211 with a  "trucker", who happens to be packing  a cop issue H&K 9mm. I get tipped  that something is going down when  she passes me a note. How's that for  twisted logic? How did she know there  was trouble unless they pulled the  guns before I "walked" in? And if  that's true, why'd they stop and  wait until I woke up to gaffle the  money? Then I notice how beefy they  both are. Hell, even the waitress is  cut. All three of them look like  they went through the same training  program. Ergo they ain't strangers  and this isn't what it seems. That's  how I knew yo-yo wouldn't get a round  off even if I gave him all day. Why?
He aims at the Waitress and FIRES! She's startled, but un
Cuz there's nothing but blanks in  these guns. And no offense, but their  performances were terrible.
Xander tosses the gun on the counter. Gibbons gives a sly smile.
Not bad. Not bad at all. Have a seat.
Gibbons sits in a booth. Xander sits across from him. In background the Waitress helps the Trucker and Salesman up
Most guys we ran through this either  took off or helped them rob the place.  I expected you to do the same.
That shows me already that you don't  have a clue. What's it to you, anyway?
Whether you thought this was for  real or not, you jumped in and helped  the waitress on instinct. That tells  me something about your character.
Good for you. Now why don't you stop  wasting my time and tell me what you  want. You didn't go through all this  for my benefit.
It's your lucky day. You just might  get the chance to pay back our  wonderful country for all the freedom  you enjoy.
A Fed, I shoulda known. Who else  would have this kind of budget? Now  you're gonna hit me with the sales  pitch.
Alright, Cage, you've got me. This  is one of those moments. "Many are  called, few are chosen", that kind  of thing. Your government needs you.  Are you up for the challenge?
..If you're trolling around for narcs,  man, have you got the wrong guy.
Why is that?
Look at me, dude, do I look like a  fan of law enforcement? Forget the  tests, you shoulda just asked me. I  woulda saved you a lot of trouble.
Oh I don't know, I think the tests  work pretty well. Sometimes they  give me answers you wouldn't admit  to in a million years.
Are we done now? You've got nothing  on me. So if you ain't booking me,  I'm walking.
You've got this wrong. You're not  under arrest, you've been abducted.  And until I say different, you belong  to me.
Is that a fact?
Sure as gravity. I've had a feeling  about you from the start, Cage. It's  nausea.
(smiles) You know what I hate? Any scumbag  with a clean shirt and a bad haircut  can get one of those tin stars and  suddenly they think they're God.
(smiles) You know what I hate? It's always  the assholes that pass the tests.
There's a POP and Xander clutches his stomach. Gibbons to his DART GUN onto the table. Xander blinks at him. He pulls another CHROME DART from his gut and examines it
You bastards love to see me sleep.
WHACK! He goes face down on the table.
He comes to, blinking in low RED LIGHT. He's shocked to f that he's...

Xander's on the floor of a military aircraft. TWO OTHER T GUYS are waking up next to him. One's a greaser named VIR the other is T.J., ex-Navy. Xander notices as they each pull out CHROME DARTS. They s up, looking at each other. Xander chuckles.
What's so damn funny?
Been to any good diners lately?
The three laugh, realizing they're all in the same boat.
We must be the final "candidates".

They quiet down as they notice for the first time, THEY A NOT ALONE. Sitting silently on benches facing them are SOLDIERS DRES IN BLACK. They wear BLACK MASKS over their faces. They ar nasty looking BLACK OPS TEAM.
Nobody told me this was a costume  party.
The Black Ops Team, just stares.
I've worked with guys like this  before. Black Ops. Serious government  spooks.
Virg notices something STRAPPED TO HIS BODY. They all hav them.
Heads up, man. What's this thing on  my back?
A parachute. This does not argue  well.
Then the red light switches to GREEN. One of the Soldiers opens the JUMP DOOR. The rest of the  team advances on Xander, Virg and T.J.
This is bullshit! Hey!
They drag Virg to the door and THROW HIM OUT. T.J. goes n kicking and fighting. Then they turn on Xander.
I get the picture.
Xander jumps out on his own. We see him tumbling away from the airplane. Far below his chute BLOSSOMS OPEN.
We see three chutes coming down. The first two HIT HARD. We ROCKET IN on the last chute as Xander lands like a pro The other guys run up to him. Then they hear SHOUTING in  SPANISH.
Jee-zus, man! What the hell now?  Another damn test?
We should head for those trees.
Don't look at me, brother. It's every  man for himself.

They wrestle out of their chutes and push past each other they TAKE OFF IN DIFFERENT DIRECTIONS. Xander runs low down a culvert. There's SHOUTING all arou He flattens down and crawls up over the rise. What he see stuns him.
You gotta be kidding me.

We crane up to reveal A FIELD OF POT PLANTS. There's a CO PROCESSING PLANT along the field's edge. The whole place  looks exactly like a Central American DRUG FARM. NARCO TERRORISTS run around with AK-47's. Xander sneaks past EQUIPMENT covered in CAMOUFLAGE NETTIN A squad of Narcos runs by and Xander makes his move. He rounds another pile of equipment and comes right into HEADLIGHTS of a truck. Narcos hop out and charge forward. Xander raises his hands.
You boys are too good for me. Guess  I failed this one, huh?
They grab him and haul him away.

We see a RUSTY MEAT HOOK. A CHAIN is wrapped around it. Attached to the chain, his arms over his head, is Xander. He's in the middle of a bleak looking room. There are  BLOODSTAINS on the wooden walls, the floor strewn with fi HAY. Behind him against the wall Xander sees T.J. and Virg bot HOG-TIED.
So much for "every man for himself".  Nice to see you again, fellas.
They really went all out on this  one. This is a pretty gnarly setup.
Check the table in the corner.
There's a BLOOD STAINED TOWEL COVERING a TABLE near the d
This oughta be good.
Then they hear talking outside and the door is UNLOCKED. A very nasty looking Marco comes in. By his look he's the LEADER.
This must be el jefe. How's it goin'  jefe? Some weather we're havin'.

Narco Guards bring in one of their PARACHUTES and toss it the floor. They exit, closing the door behind them. Jefe goes to the table throws back the towel. Beneath it HIDEOUS, BLOOD ENCRUSTED TORTURE DEVICES: a HACK SAW, a B CUTTERS, KNIVES, CHISELS, a BLOW TORCH.
What's on the menu tonight? The old  blowtorch-to-the-family jewels  routine, I'll bet. Hey, you want  roasted nuts, let's break out the  Planters.
T.J. and Virg both crack up. Jefe gives them a withering  look.
Do you know what we do with people  come round here? You know what we do  with people come in our business?
Jefe passes his hand over the various tools. He finally  settles on a crude MACHETE. He walks amongst them brandis it.
We cut the Achilles tendon. Your  feet flop around like a marionette.  You ain't walkin' nowhere no more. Sound good, tough guy? Or maybe  instead you wanna tell me something.
He stops in front of Xander.
Whatchu doing here?
Oh, I don't know. It was an accident.

You're one sick bastard. A sadist  with a badge looking to rope me in  to a suicide mission. I think no  matter which way I go I'm likely to  wind up face down on a sheet of  plastic. So here's my answer: kiss  my ass, Hop-along.

Listen to you. Right away, sir,  anything you say, sir.

Outside the Ivans nod approval and Xander heads to the of Yorgi looks to kirill, who puts his hand on his PISTOL. Xander opens the door.

Just then Petra's computer BEEPS and the MONEY floods int their account. Xander holds up a CELL PHONE and smiles.

Of course.
He nods for Kirill to stand down. OUTSIDE - the two transport trucks are driven off by the  Ivans. As they pull out they reveal ANOTHER CAR under a C

Come on, get in.

Next door to the warehouse sits an ABANDONED BUILDING. Up the sloped roof, Slovo spies down on the transaction. He' got a camera with a big zoom lens.

Yorgi!
They all look to the abandoned building. Through the second floor window they can see Slovo's leg  poking through the ceiling. Xander is taken aback.
What in the hell...?

Yorgi turns to Xander, goes for his pistol. Thinking fast, Xander does the same. They draw simultaneously and hold the guns to each other' heads as they sit in the car. Petra, Kirill and Anders dr as well, all of them covering Xander.
What's going on, my friend?
You tell me! You got a sniper up  there or what?
He's not with us, Xander. He must be  with you.
(he cocks the hammer) Bullshit! You get your boy off that  roof or I swear to God I'm gonna  give you another hole to breathe out  of.
Yorgi stares, finally believes him. He lowers his gun.
Get him! Find out who he is!
By now Slovo is down the fire escape. He hits the ground goes running down the street. The Anarchy 99 crew heads for their cars. Xander SPINS th cylinder on his REVOLVER.
I've got him. Buckle up.
The GTO peels out.
Slovo is huffing and puffing as fast as he can when Xande comes skidding around the corner. He looks back and sees speeding GTO.
That's the cop from the club!

Xander does the only thing he can. He puts the car sidewa and aims out the window as he slides to a stop. Slovo turns and BLAM! Xander SHOOTS Slovo right in the ch IN SLO-MO: a spray of BLOOD erupts from his chest and Slo falls backwards, his face frozen in a look of shock and  betrayal. The smoking shell clatters to the ground. Slovo blinks up at Xander, gasping for words, then lays s Xander hops out, rifles through Slovo's pockets. The othe Anarchy 99 cars pull up, the whole group looking on.
What are you doing? Get in the car!
Xander heads back to the GTO and the cars peel out.
The rest of Anarchy 99 follows behind the GTO.
I don't believe it! You can't shoot  a cop in the middle of the street!
(grim) Had to do what I had to do.
He pulls out the roll of FILM. Yorgi laughs.
You say you get a million, you get  the million. Some cop gives us shit,  he's dead. Jesus Christ, man, you're  hard-core!
The Ivans pull up in their transport trucks. They see all the blood and rush towards Slovo. But something doesn't l right. Ivan 1 TASTES the blood and spits it out.
It's sweet.
Ivan 2 pulls a CHROME DART from Slovo's chest. Slovo GROA

It's a crowded basement rave club. Hot and sweaty RAVERS  dance in provocative outfits. The Anarchy 99 group is sta on the best booth, right on the packed dance floor. Surrounding them are a handful of MAFIYA BODYGUARDS who s at attention like the Secret Service. Anders swings from a water pipe and then drops onto the t smashing glass. A DRUNK GUY tries to pull Petra onto the dance floor and PUNCHES him. The Bodyguards drag the dude out for a prope thrashing. Yorgi shatters a BOTTLE against the wall.
Total chaos, man! Welcome to Anarchy  99!
What's "Anarchy 99"?

It's all this craziness! It's what  we've been living since 99, when we  left the Army. One of our brothers  died in Grozny and we said the hell  with this shit. What for? He dies  for what? Politics? Who's politics?  Not ours.
You wanna see my politics?
Xander shows him a TATTOO on his arm. It shows PLANET EAR with a giant SCREW through it.
Screw the world. If I'm gonna die  for something, it better be bitches  and money.
That's what I'm talking about, man!  That's why Anarchy 99 was born.
Yorgi rolls up his sleeve, revealing an Anarchy 99 tat (a circled "A" with "99" underneath).

To us it means no walls, no speed  limits, no jails. It's everybody  does what he wants. People think  democracy is freedom but they don't  have a clue. There's an old punk  song. It says: "America stands for  freedom, but if you think you're  free..."
"...try walking into a deli and  urinating on the cheese". 'Anarchy  Burger' by the Vandals.
You got it, man. It's stupid but  it's true. True freedom is when you  do whatever you want anytime you  want. That's when you know you're  living, man.
How you gonna do that with government  and rules everywhere?
Easy. You get enough money that you  grow an ass big enough for the whole  world to kiss.
Yorgi throws a fistful of money onto the dance floor. The Xed out ravers swat it around like confetti.
You hang with us, buddy, taste some  freedom! Petra! Dance with this guy!
Yorgi melts into the dance floor crowd, leaving Xander al with Petra. She gets up grumpily and starts dancing. Xand joins her, but she won't even look at him.
This is great, dancing with the back  of your head.
She reluctantly turns around.
If you got a problem with me, why  are we dancing?
Yorgi asked me to.
You do everything Yorgi says?
Go to hell.
It's gonna be like that, huh? You  got all bent out of shape as soon as  he started dancing with someone else.  Why's that?
Mind your business.
Did you guys used to date? That's  it, right? He broke your heart and  you're still soft on him. That's  funny, it don't seem to fit with a  tough broad like you.
She glares at him and walks away. Xander follows.
Where are you going?
Why are you still hanging around?  Your business is finished, you should  go home.
I was invited. What's your story?
I don't know who you are or where  you come from, but I don't like you.  You ask too many questions.
There's a big line outside the "ladies" and no line at th "men's". Petra heads into the Men's Room. Some DUDE whistles at her. She pushes him out of the way enters a stall. Xander leans on the sink.
Come on, don't front like that. You'll  put a guy right off you.
Don't even bother, X man, I'm not  your type.
That right? Why's that?
The stall door flies open and Petra marches out.
My chest is too small and my brain  is too big.

She shoves him to the door and stomps back to her stall. Xander walks back out, shaking his head and laughing. Across the room, Viktor shoves the D.J. out of the way an puts on "ANARCHY BURGER" by the Vandals. The rave dance i interrupted by the pounding punk beat.
Xander, check it out! The revolution  begins!
Viktor and Anders swiftly turn the dance floor into a vio mosh pit. Xander can't help it, he actually likes these g
Let's get some air, man.
Yorgi and Xander head outside. A moment later, Kirill hur out another door.
It's late. Yorgi and Xander stroll along the river.
You got a great set-up here Yorgi.  You really know how to live.
It's a beautiful town, Prague. It's  been good to me.
I've been here before, when I was a  kid. My old man was in the service,  we used to live on the Army base in  Hamburg.
You, an Army brat? I don't see that  one at all. Did you join the service  as well?

Hell no. My dad was a straight up  tin soldier. Somehow he pissed this  general off and got himself  dishonorably discharged. Had a court  martial and everything. The charges  were total bullshit, so he was sure  he'd get his name cleared, but it  didn't happen.
Connections and politics, it's the  same everywhere.
My old man, he bought into the system,  and it screwed him. So he swallowed  a bullet. Me, I don't believe in  nothing I can't see and touch.

The camera suddenly ZOOMS across the city, flying over st and houses until, half a mile away, it finds Kirill in a  window with his SNIPER RIFLE. P.O.V. THROUGH SCOPE - Xander's head is in the crosshairs The scope pans over to Yorgi, who looks INTO CAMERA and g a small signal, calling off the hit.
Yorgi looks up at a "PRAGUE PEACE CONFERENCE" banner.

Next week these idiots are having a  peace conference here. What the hell  are they going to talk about? It's  the system itself that causes all  the world's problems. You're okay,  buddy. Come on, it's getting early.
They stroll off and Kirill stands down.
A flotilla of VEHICLES (Xander's GTO among them) drives  through the gate in a massive, stone wall. It's a big man house in the middle of town.

The GTO, sedans, SUV's park in the courtyard. Xander sees row of MOTORCYCLES parked here as well. Xander also sees a Guard hit a switch that LOWERS the HEA WOODEN GATE. Yorgi corrals a bunch of STRIPPERS he's brought home.
This way, girls, let's go!
He leads the whole troop inside.
As they go down the hall/Xander sees ROOMS FULL OF OFFICE WORKERS and MAFIYA GOONS.
Diversified global operations. The  sun never sets on our empire.
Xander takes in WORLD MAPS, FAX MACHINES, BANKS OF COMPUT For all their screwing around, it's clear Anarchy 99 runs large operation.

With leaded glass windows overlooking the river, this pla is beautiful. Inside it's done up more like the house fro MTV's "Real World", except trashed. There's cool fish tan a pool table, PS2 on a flatscreen and spray paint and hol all over the walls. SERVANTS welcome them with food and Yorgi's SECRETARY giv him important messages.
(sorting through  messages) Not bad, yes? The original owners,  they just one day decide to move  out.
Anders starts pounding on a drumset. Petra kicks a soccer ball at him.
Yeb vas, z'opa. Shut up!
Yorgi paws at a Stripper.
I've got meetings this afternoon,  I've got to get some sleep. Just  pick a girl.
That's alright, I'm kinda tired.
You want to insult me? This is my  hospitality. Pick one.
Xander points at one of the Strippers. She's wearing a  fashionable FLAK JACKET.
Good, now find a room to crash in.
Petra, show him. The surly Petra opens a door, revealing a hall of doors. Xander and Flak Jacket follow.
You gonna tuck us in?
She just gives him a nasty look, walks into her room and  slams the door. Xander scratches his head and picks a roo The others shuffle off to their beds with their Strippers
Flak Jacket is out of sight in the bathroom. Xander talks her while he gets undressed.
Listen, no offense, but I'm not in  the market right now, okay? You can  stay here, but let's not --
He trails off as she steps out of the bathroom. She's wea just a G-string and the flak jacket.
You don't understand a word I'm  saying, do you?
She just smiles at him sweetly and pulls his shirt off. S looks at the ENGAGEMENT RING still pierced through his ni and gives a puzzled look.
Stupid, right? That's what I was  trying to tell you. I just got out  of this heavy thing...
She kisses him and lets the flak jacket fall (PG-13 style
The things I have to do for my  country.
He gives in and starts making out with her.
Xander sneaks out of his room and down the hail. Behind h we can see Flak Jacket asleep amongst the tussled sheets.
Anders is snoring on the floor. Xander skirrs around him goes through another door.
Xander finds an office and starts going through the desk. finds a PALM PILOT and snaps a RECORDING DEVICE to the bo In seconds he's copied everything on it. He moves on to s drawers.
What are you doing?
He turns, sees Petra standing in the doorway with a GUN.
Looking for a phone book. I want to  call a cab. Unless you wanna give me  a ride?
She shuts the door, advances, staring him down.
Who are you?
We hung out last night, remember?
I also remember you drove your car  here. Who are you really? Make no  mistake, I will shoot you and not  feel bad about it. Who are you working  for?
Hey, take it easy. I'm just a dude  trying to make a buck.
She SLAPS him, hard.
Bullshit. I see you look at  everything, study everything, ask  questions. I know exactly what you're  doing. Empty your pockets.
You've got to relax, baby, you're  paranoid.
She SLAPS him again and Xander goes for her gun. Before h can pry it from her hand, she's pulled another gun from  nowhere and has it jammed against his neck. He lets go.
Hey, you're good.
Maybe we should start again, yes? I  know so little about you, except  that you're not what you say you  are.
That makes two of us then, sweetheart,  because I ain't buying your bullshit  either. You're not like them, I can  see it in your eyes. So you tell me,  who's bullshitting who?
There are THREE STRIPPERS asleep in bed. Yorgi is sitting his COMPUTER in his underwear. He's hacked in to the CZECH POLICE network.
Something bothers me about you, Mr.  Xander Cage...
He looks around a bit, doesn't find what he's looking for He sits up, getting pissed.
Get Kirill. Now!
She heads out. Yorgi goes to the bathroom, splashes water his face. Kirill enters, still half asleep.
What's the problem?
I'm inside the police mainframe. Do  you see anything?
Kirill studies the screen while Yorgi pulls on clothes.
What?
I've searched their E-mail. No funeral  announcement, no obituary, no call- to-arms. Nothing on the news, even.  I swear I saw a cop get shot  yesterday. How come no one is talking  about it?
Kirill looks back at the screen. Nothing there.

I also check the wire transfer. I  follow the money back to it's source,  but there is no source. It comes  from nowhere. First they bring CIA,  then British SAS, now maybe they  plumb the lower depths. Maybe now  they send someone who looks like us.  Maybe someone like our houseguest  Mr. X.
Petra still has the gun on Xander.
I don't know what you're talking  about.

The eyes don't lie. All this has  gotten to you, hasn't it, Petra? You  came in as Yorgi's girlfriend and  you stayed because it was fun. Now  you don't like it so much, but you're  in so deep you can't get out anymore.  Tell me if I'm wrong, Petra.
Go to hell!
Look at you. You're helping run things  now. You're a gangster. I bet that  snuck up on you. You woke up one day  and you were a criminal.
She pulls back the hammer on her gun.
It's cool, I feel you. I might even  be able to help. Here, let me show  you something. You wanna see what's  in my pocket, I'll show you.
He makes a move and she jabs the gun at him. She reaches  into the pocket for him and pulls out his little data  recorder.
What are you?
I'm an information gatherer. You  wanna go somewhere and talk about  it?

Yorgi creeps down the hall, Kirill in tow. They both scre SILENCERS onto their PISTOLS. They flatten themselves up against the wall and prepare t burst into Xander's room. One... Two... THREE! They kick in the door and aim their guns around. Flak Jacket sits up, terrified. Yorgi and Kirill lower their guns. Viktor stumbles by in underwear.

This is a beautiful and historic Prague location with WIN and a nice view. It's rather fancy and PACKED with UPSCAL PATRONS. Petra and Xander sit in the middle of the room,  sticking out badly in their grungy clothes. A WAITER takes their order.

(shrugs) I'm from L.A.

Don't judge a comic book by it's  cover.
You agree with a lot of what he says,  don't you.
I know where he's coming from. The  only thing I really don't get is why  he dumped you. Up until I found that  out, I thought his judgment was pretty  sound.
Don't even start. I'll be honest, I  don't trust you. Bur lets pretend  for a minute that what you say is  true, that I want to leave. What can  you do about it?
The people I know want facts, the  kinds of things an insider would  know. They're interested in putting  Anarchy 99 out of business.
All I have to do is risk my life  providing you with these facts.
We could work together. Then maybe  we could both get the hell out of  here. There's a beach in Bora Bora  with my name on it.
A beach named X? That I'd like to  see.
So there you have it. I guess you  just have to ask yourself, how bad  to you want out?
She thinks on it. Then her cell phone RINGS.
(into phone) Da!
(on phone) Listen very carefully, Petra. We  think Cage may be an American agent,  do you understand what I'm telling  you?
(into phone) Yes.
(on phone) Don't worry, I've got your back. I'm  right across the street, above the  bakery. Just bring him outside and  let me do the rest.

What's up? Is there a problem?
She studies his eyes, decides to risk it.
They tell me you're an American agent.
What are you talking about?
There's no more time for games. They  made you. There's a sniper out front  waiting to put a bullet in your eye.  Tell me if it's true.
It's a long story, but yeah, more or  less.

Jesus Christ. You're going to have  to go out the back. The data that  you copied with your toy. Tomorrow,  at six o'clock. Look it up. We're  taking a trip. Be there at six and  you'll have plenty to tell your  people.
If I go out the back, he'll know  you've warned me.
That's alright, I'll figure something  out.
Not an option. Just get up slowly  like everything's cool. Petra, trust  me. You just hung yourself out to  dry for me, I'm not gonna let you  down.

Kirill lays on his stomach, peering into the scope of his SILENCED SNIPER RIFLE. P.O.V. Through scope - he can faintly see them inside the crowded restaurant. Xander and Petra are making their way towards the exit.
Nice and easy, Petra...
They work their way through the lunchtime crowd.
I can't let this happen. I want you  to go out the back. I'll make up  some excuse.
They'll kill you, you know they will.  Besides, there is no back door. Keep  smiling. Ready? Now.

Xander's timed it perfectly so that just as they get to t door, a BUS passes by. Kirill keeps focused, waiting for the bus to pass. P.O.V. THROUGH SCOPE - Xander's head is sporadically visi through the bus windows. Kirill's finger tightens on the trigger... As soon as the bus passes he FIRES! But Xander's not there, he's ducked down to tie his shoe. CRASH! The glass door behind him shatters. Feigning surpr Xander PUNCHES PETRA IN THE FACE and sprints down the blo He runs bent low, the parked cars protecting him from the sniper. Kirill fires anyway, taking out car windows. He hops on the serving tray like it's a skateboard and do a RAIL-SLIDE down the length of the stairs. He's moving t fast for Kirill. He jumps off at the bottom and the tray POPS UP INTO THE  AIR. Kirill BLASTS it like a clay pigeon. By now Xander is out of sight. Kirill pounds his rifle in frustration. Petra gets to the top of the stairs. She gives Kirill a " did he go?" look. Her nose is bloody, helping to sell her performance. Then she turns and looks off after Xander. She sees his G speeding away.

We're looking down at a SHIP moving through the fjord, se from high above. It's towing a SMALLER BOAT behind it. An airplane? No, we're at the top of the Trollveggen, Norway legendary "Troll Wall". It's a near 5,000 foot sheer drop the ocean. Six figures stand at the edge of the barren cliff. They w webbed "squirrel" jumpsuits, helmets and parachutes. On e thigh they have pistols and on their chests they have sil MP-5 sub-machine guns. Together they stare down at the sh Petra is among them. She looks down at her watch. It is  precisely 5:59PM. She glances around. The top of the clif is rocky and flat. Xander is nowhere to be seen. FIFTY YARDS AWAY - we see Xander sneaking forward militar style. He's got his "stakeout suit" on and is keeping low
The members of Anarchy 99 put on their goggles and, witho saying a word, they leap off the Troll Wall. Xander runs to the edge and looks down. He sees the group freefailing down the sheer cliff face.
Very nice.

The six plummet away from him at incredible speed. In a h arch, they peak at 120 m.p.h. Then, using the webbed wings under their arms and between their legs, they go into aerodynamic "track" positions an rocket away from the wall. Like dark angels, they soar out over the water in formati

The ship below is a scientific research vessel. On the de a few SAILORS and SCIENTISTS watch the sun set. The six dark figures close in rapidly. At the last moment they pull their chutes and deftly glid towards the ship. A sailor looks up and spots them. Before he can shout, he's SHOT IN THE LEG and goes down. Seconds later, they're on the deck, tearing off their rig They race across the deck, taking over the ship in a surg manner. They herd everyone back heading for the bridge. Petra hangs back. She looks back at the cliff, up towards Xander. XANDER'S P.O.V. Through his SUPER BINOCULARS we see them storming the bri As they head inside, they disappear from view.
