Let's see what's going on inside...
Now he can see THROUGH THE WALLS OF THE SHIP. He sees THE CREW, herded into a room and LOCKED IN by Ana 99.
Anarchy 99 seals the door, locking the crew away. They sl five and bump chests, still totally amped up.

ANGLE ON - a LARGE SUBMERSIBLE VEHICLE. It's white and tw feet long. There are MOTORS on either side and a PANEL OF SOLAR CELLS on the top of a periscope-like projection ris from the back. This is the AHAB DEVICE. It sits in the WET WELL at the b of the ship, ready to be launched out the back sea doors.
Ready the boat.

There is a SMALLER BOAT moored to the back of the ship. Kirill and Viktor hop onto it's deck. They start to WHIST as they work. Sounds like the "Andy Griffith" theme. XANDER'S BINOCULARS P.O.V. He takes DIGITAL PHOTOS of the Ahab device.
What the hell are you guys stealing?

The smaller boat is launched and ready to do. Yorgi goes the WET WELL CONTROLS and hits a switch. The aft doors open, letting water into the wet well. In  seconds Ahab starts to float. Anders loosens it from it's moorings and they TIE AHAB TO THE BACK OF THE SMALLER BOA
Ready.
Yorgi hits another switch, opening the BALLAST DOORS on t port side of the ship. Air flows out, causing the ship to list to one side.
What are you doing?
It all happened so fast. Such an  unfortunate accident.
Yorgi MACHINE GUNS the wet well control panel.
Let's go.

They climb onto the boat. Petra is the last to board. She looks up towards Xander and MACHINE GUNS the panel some m making sure he notices. XANDER'S P.O.V. He sees the smaller boat pulling away, the Ahab device be towed behind. He pans over and ZOOMS IN on the shot-up co panel.
What the hell...?

He pans over to the wet well and sees it's flooding. With the ballast open on only one side, the ship starts  LISTING. The thing is going down. He pans over, clicks into "penetrator" mode, and sees the Crew pounding on the walls below decks. They're trapped,  their WRISTS AND ANKLES BOUND WITH PLEXI-CUFFS.
Xander puts down the binoculars and gets up.
No way, man, no way. I'm just supposed  to be an observer. Aw shit. This job  sucks.
He pats his jumpsuit, checking for the buckle.
Toby Lee Shavers, if this thing don't  work, your ass is kicked.

Xander steels himself, takes a few deep breaths. Then he sprints to the edge and JUMPS off the cliff... And that's it. He's gone. One mile, straight down. Suddenly we're falling with him. We hear the rush of air as he free-falls a dozen feet fro the craggy rock face. The force of the wind ripples his cheeks. He streamlines himself into a track position and jets awa from the cliff like Superman. Before he gets too low, he RIPS THE BUCKLE. Immediately his jumpsuit TEARS OFF HIS BODY in MULTIPLE  LAYERS, unfurling into a full sized PARASAIL. Xander looks up at his parasail, relieved, and glides tow the ship.
Petra spots the parasail and has to act quickly to keep Y from spotting it. She grabs him suddenly and KISSES him.
What was that for?
I'd forgotten how exciting it is  working together.
You've been so quiet lately, Petra,  I thought you no longer cared.
Why don't we go below decks and work  off some of this adrenaline.
(smiles) Viktor! Stay the course.
Yorgi kisses her again and heads to the cabin below.
Xander comes in for a perfect landing. He lands on the li deck and undoes his harness. He sees several WOUNDED scattered on the deck.
Son of a bitch!
He looks across the water, sees the smaller boat far away
Petra looks back one last time, catching sight of Xander the deck of the ship. She smiles, relieved. Then she turns solemn as she heads below decks to pay the price.
Xander gets to the wet well and sees the water flooding i With the ship listing like this, the water is pouring bel decks.

Xander opens a hatch and lowers himself into the hold. He is where the entire Crew has been left to drown. They are struggling to stay above water, their hands and feet boun As the far end of the room is another HATCH. Water pours from this one and Xander has to get it shut. He swims through the struggling Crew, spots the CAPTAIN  holding his YOUNG SON above water. The water is rising  rapidly, filling up the compartment. Xander braces his feet against the bulkhead and PUSHES, b the force of the water is too much. He surfaces. He's got to wait until the room floods befor he can close that door. He watches as the Crew goes into a panic, the water risin up to the ceiling. They are gasping in the last foot of a that's available. He sees the Captain's Son, crying and  clutching at his father. Xander takes a deep breath and dives down. He grabs the h door, braces his feet and PULLS. His muscles strain as the heavy metal door slowly swings  SHUT. Xander surfaces and swims to the ladder. He CUTS the Capt plastic cuffs.
Is the boy alright?
Yes. I will cut the others loose,  you must run the bilge pumps!
The Captain takes the knife and swims to free his men. Xander takes the Captain's Son and climbs up the ladder.
Xander scans the controls but has no idea what he's looki for. The Captain's Son shows him the right switch.
You sure?
The Son nods and Xander flips the switch. MOTORS start to HUM.
The bilge pumps spew out water furiously. Crew members co up from below decks. They are soaked and grateful. They g about tending to the wounded as Xander slumps down next t the exhausted Captain.
Captain, huh? You get a lot of broads  with that uniform?
They both laugh, relieved, as the ship slowly rights itse
Xander is in a room with the SCIENTISTS from the ship. Th have blueprints of the torpedo spread out. The Captain's is wrapped in BLANKETS, shivering. Xander is talking to Gibbons on his communicator.
(into communicator) They call it "Ahab", it's a solar  powered submersible. It can  circumnavigate the globe on it's  own. They use it to track and study  the migration patterns of whales.

head_text.subj: GIBBONS IN THE ULTIMATE INFORMATION ROOM

text: Gibbons jots down the information furiously.
You did say "Ahab"? You're sure about  that?

Yeah, I sent you pictures. Here's  what I'm thinking. If they take out  the cameras and sensors, they could  probably put a bomb in this thing.  You drop it in the water in the Red  Sea and three weeks later it's  swimming up the Potomac.
This is good work, X, damn fine work.  You need to press on at all costs,  find out what they have planned with  this "Ahab".
Hey, one miracle at a time. They're  on to me now, remember?
I'm gonna be en route with a team  shortly to relieve you. Just keep  the pressure on until the cavalry  arrives. And X? You done yourself  proud helping those people today.
Xander tussles the hair of the Captain's Son.
Thanks.
You're a grungy little phoenix, you  know that? Keep up the good work.
You ain't seen nothing yet.
The GTO screeches into the lot. Shavers is on his way out with his SUITCASE.
Get in. We've got work to do.
PAN OVER WEAPONS - they're all laid out on the floor. 50  cal. MACHINE GUNS, MINES, ROCKETS, BELTS OF AMMO. We finally arrive at Xander leaning on his GTO. He sparks BLOWTORCH and lights a CIGAR.
I want all that... (he pats the GTO) In there.
Shavers looks on in shock. He's got a crew of MECHANICS w him. Xander hands him the blowtorch and walks away.

This is a beautiful open air market in a town square  surrounded by old buildings. The place is PACKED. In the midst of it all, we make out Petra moving through crowd. She stops to look at some vegetables when Xander p by her.
Right behind you.
They keep talking, pretending to shop.
So what's the plan with this Ahab?  Are they selling it or what?
No, something worse. He says it's a  surprise, but I know him. This is  his masterpiece.
We've got to find out what it is.  Can you handle that?
(beat) There's something I didn't have time  to tell you before.
What's that?
I'm a agent as well. KGB. I've been  undercover for over a year.
You're what? What the hell have you  been doing?

I don't know. Eight months ago I  stop hearing from my people. No  explanation, just silence. So I stay  and I wait like I was told. Soon I'm  in so far, they'd kill me if I left.  Now every day I get farther and  farther away from what I was. I'm  like you said, a criminal.
I'm busted up for you, but Jesus,  what the hell are you doing? Those  people almost drowned on that boat  and you didn't lift a finger.
This stings her. She knows well the price she paid.
No, I guess I've been no help at all  to you.
Get your head back in the game. There  are lives at stake here.
Of course. I'll do what I can. I  have to go, before they notice.
When can I see you again?
You can't, it's too risky. I'm not  much help anyway, remember?
Then she's off into the crowd.

The craggy surface of the wall is swathed in shadows. Xan approaches and flattens himself against it. He's all in B packed with weapons and sporting a COMBAT VEST. He grabs a toehold on the wall and ZOOM! He SPEED CLIMBS the side. He reaches the top in seconds and scopes out the manor ho VIDEO CAMERAS, PATROLLING GUARDS. It's not gonna be easy. Xander slips over the wall down to the courtyard below.
Xander places an EXPLOSIVE on a CONTROL BOX. He waits for a GUARD to stroll by and then slips through basement window.

Xander makes his way through a series of rooms. Finally h finds himself in a study with a window overlooking the  CAVERNOUS BASEMENT of the Manor. Laid out below he can see the AHAB DEVICE, hanging from  chains. TECHIES are working with the Anarchy 99 crew to  RETROFIT the thing. They are installing a LAUNCHER RACK of TEN TUBES. Xander can't hear a thing through the thick glass. He takes a METAL BALL from his pocket. There's a sink in corner and he drops the metal ball down the drain.

We follow the metal ball as it rolls through the trap and down into the wall. The pipe zigzags around like a  rollercoaster and then levels off. The ball rolls past a T-intersection, stops, and unrolls  like a pill bug. Six metal legs appear and we see it's the ROACH CAM. It  scuttles back up the pipe and makes the turn.

We're close on a sink as the Roach Cam comes up the pipe. scurries into hiding just as a HAND reaches in to turn on the water. The roach peers out from between items on a workbench and PUSH IN on it's VIDEO CAMERA head.
We see a handheld video image of Viktor.
Okay, fire one.
Viktor pushes a button on Ahab and a VODKA BOTTLE launche from tube one, SHATTERING against the ceiling.
Perfect!

Pull back to reveal Xander watching the image on his  communicator. Using a joystick he's able to control the r He steers the camera towards Petra, gets a low-angle shot her legs in a punked-out CATHOLIC SCHOOL GIRL SKIRT. He smiles, enjoying himself.
Great piece of hardware.
He plugs his earpiece in and listens in.

Petra works on a COMPUTER CONTROLLER. The roach scurries across the floor, circling to get a be look at Ahab. Anders pushes a CART holding TEN GLASS CANISTERS OF LIQUI Each canister is separated in two, with a BLACK LIQUID on top and a WHITE LIQUID on the bottom. He hands the canisters to Viktor one by one.
(singing) "Silent Night... Holy Night"
Viktor laughs and joins in. Then Kirill looks down and SPOTS THE ROACH CAM. He STOMPS it with his boot.
Xander jerks out his earpiece and rubs his ear.
Damn.
He looks down into the room, sees Kirill bending down to  examine the roach. Time to go.
Kirill lifts the dead "roach" and sees its wires.
There's some bullshit going on!
Yorgi hits an ALARM switch, alerting the guards. The Anarchy boys grab weapons and start racing through th house.
The Anarchy boys move swiftly from room to room in practi close combat maneuvers. Cueing each other with hand signals, they run through eac room, weapons ready.
Xander sprints down the hallway. With the Anarchy 99 boys and Guards roaming the house, he's having a hard time fin his way out.

He runs into a darkened dining hall, sprints across only find the opposite door locked. He hides behind one of the many COLUMNS as his pursuers enter the room. Kirill gives a thumbs up and puts on a pair of NIGHT VISI GOGGLES. He scans the big room but sees nothing. Xander, hidden at the opposite end, waits breathlessly. Kirill advances slowly, his buddies covering him from the door.

Xander, my friend, that can only be  you. Why don't we put our weapons  down for a few minutes and discuss  this like friends. How would you  like to come to work for us instead?  We could Rage Against the Machine  together.
Across the room, Xander sees a small window leading to th courtyard. He has to run across open ground to reach it. calls out to Yorgi.
Speaking of people that are full of  shit, funny you should mention those  guys!
Xander's voice echoes around the empty hall, making it  impossible to pinpoint.
They put their records out through  Sony, one of the biggest corporate  machines on the planet. Some  revolutionaries, huh?
He pulls out his gun as Kirill creeps ever closer. Against the far wall Xander spots a FIRE EXTINGUISHER.
Come on, you're the one who's fooling  yourself. Why risk your life for  your government when we can offer  you a future that is truly free?

Kirill is almost on top of him. Xander sights up and FIRES. The fire extinguisher EXPLODES, blinding Kirill. Xander makes a run for it. Everyone FIRES WILDLY (except for Petra), bullets tearing tapestries off the walls. Xander dives and crashes through the window.

Xander tuck and rolls, comes up running. Guards are running around, unsure just what the hell is g on. Xander hops on one of the TRIALS MOTORCYCLES parked nearb and fires up the engine. He hits a remote switch and BLAM The EXPLOSIVE CHARGE he left earlier blows-up. He points the bike at a set of STONE STAIRS. They form a  "ramp" that he can use to JUMP THE WALL. He GUNS THE ENGI A Guard races across the wall with a rifle, taking aim. Xander races and JUMPS THE BIKE over the wail. As he goes he does a CAN-CAN AERIAL, KICKING THE GUARD OFF THE WALL  before he can shoot. The Anarchy 99 guys run outside just in time to see him g
He blew the gate control. Anders!  Get the bastard!
Anders fires up the other trials bike, slings a submachin gun across his back and goes up and over. Petra watches h go, hoping for the best.

(NOTE: action will be re-choreographed based on actual  locations. Any freestyle motorcycle moves will be motivat by a physical reason) Xander blazes down the street, Anders racing right behind him. A wrong turn sends him into a dead end. At the end is a panel truck parked next to a stone wall. Xander slows the trials bike and drives it up the hood of the truck and onto it's roof. Balancing on the rear wheel he hops onto the wall. The machine gun blasts again. Xander drives off along the top of the wall. Anders shoulders his gun and follows. They are riding a 15' high wall that's only a foot wide. They make several 90 degree turns, racing above a sleepin neighborhood. Xander sees the end of the wall ahead and t a detour. He hops onto the second floor balcony of a BUILDING UNDER CONSTRUCTION.

CONSTRUCTION WORKERS bolt out of the way as the motorcycl leaps into their building. Xander pops a wheelie and slams through a BLUEPRINT TABLE Anders follows, demolishing their SNACK TABLE. Xander darts through the building, between beams and 2 x  4's, until he reaches a skeletal STAIRCASE. More WORKERS appear at the bottom of the stairs so Xander goes up. He cranks up three flights of stairs and bashes  onto the roof.

Xander looks around for a way out. The next building isn' that far away. He revs up and JUMPS ACROSS. Anders jams another magazine into his sub-machine gun and follows Xander. They jump from roof to roof, down a DESCENDING SERIES OF  ROOFTOPS towards the river. Anders pulls up alongside as  they race towards that last apartment building. Neck and neck they head for the brink. At the last jump,  Xander pulls up behind Anders. They hit the last roof in a crunch of gravel. Anders clam on the brakes and comes skidding to a stop, Xander right  behind him. They skid to a stop at the very edge, with Anders balance on his front wheel. He looks down, sees street five stori below. He glances back at Xander, sweat beading, struggling to k his balance. Xander observes him coolly, totally in contr Anders reaches for his machine gun. Xander pops a wheelie and RAMS Anders over the edge. The bike tumbles and PANCAKES into the pavement. Anders t through several AWNINGS before slamming into the ground. Xander turns and rides to the next apartment building. He hops down a steep series of roofs that will eventually take him to street level. As he makes his way down, Anders stirs. The guy is a bloo broken mess but he gets to his feet. He sees where Xander headed and he scurries off to intercept him.

Xander is heading to the far end of a dead end alley. The only way out is fenced in. But there's a RAMP leading up a LOADING DOCK. Xander will have to use that ramp to jump the fence. Anders climbs to the second floor of the building. There a small crane arm loaded with metal. If he pushes it at t right time, it will swing out and knock Xander from his b He giggles maniacally, blood dripping. Xander drops down into the alley and heads towards the ju Anders times it perfectly and swings the crane arm out. IN SLOW MOTION: The bike leaves the ramp and soars up ove the fence. The crane arm swings out, on a collision course with Xand Xander sees it and THROWS HIMSELF OFF THE BIKE, grabbing  onto the back in a SUPERMAN SEAT-GRAB. He passes RIGHT  UNDERNEATH the swinging crane arm. Anders's face falls when he sees Xander go by, hanging on with ONE HAND. In his OTHER HAND Xander's got his PISTOL.
Xander pulls himself back onto the bike and lands. He sto sees Anders' BLOODY HELMET come bouncing into the alley. tucks his pistol away and roars off.
Xander comes up the stairs and sees LIGHTS ON in his  apartment. He draws his gun and pushes the door open.
Slovo?
Slovo is sitting in the armchair.
Dude, what are you doing here?
You killed me, remember? Now I have  to hide out here with you. Where  have you been?
Xander holsters his gun, searches around for his communic
I found something big enough for us  to take these guys down with. They've  got a of nerve agent they're gonna  unleash.
Is this what you're looking for?
Xander turns to see Slovo waving the communicator.
Yeah, give it here.
Slovo raises his pistol.
Sorry, "dude".
(stunned beat) What's the deal?
Oh come on, don't feel bad. You got  played, so what? You're new at this.  Did you think you could just stroll  into this business one day and have  all the angles figured out?
Why you dogging me up?
(shrugs) They came and found me. They said  they'd kill me unless I help them.  Plus they offer me a lot of money.  No big deal. These things happen.  Dump your gun on the floor.
Xander does so.
Where do you want it? The head to be  quick? Or the chest for an open  casket?

Suddenly GUNFIRE blasts through the closed door. Bullets shatter a LAMP, a PICTURE, and finally tag Slovo a wild salvo. Slovo crumples, never knowing what hit him. The door creaks open. It's Petra, her gun still smoking. She's with the Ivans.
Are you alright?
What the hell are you doing? You  could've killed me!
(shrugs) I heard you talking. I could tell  where you were in the room.
I don't know what's going on anymore.  I thought I was square with that  dude. Now everybody's switching sides  like it's the WWF.
The Ivans go to Slovo's body, kicking the gun from his ha One of them SPITS on his corpse in disgust.
What are you doing with the Ivans?
I know which cops are good and which  are bad. Come with me. Come on, right  now.
She drags him to the door.
The beautiful and historic St. Charles bridge spans the r There are BANNERS hanging in celebration of the coming PR PEACE CONFERENCE. Petra leads Xander across it.
Where are we going?
We're getting out of this place.  We've done enough.
Wait a minute, whoa. We can't go  now. What's Yorgi got planned with  that nerve agent?
It doesn't matter anymore, forget  it.
Of course it matters. Hey, hold on!
What do we owe our governments? Yours  kidnapped you, mine abandoned me.
Petra, this ain't about the people  that sent us here, you know that.
No, now it's about us. Let's do  something for us before we both get  killed. Don't you want to get to  Bora Bora, Xander?
We can't leave now. We have to do  something.
Why? You're the one who believes in  nothing. Screw the world, or whatever  you said.
Xander grabs her by shoulders.

Alright, so I was full of shit. I  thought believing in things was wrong.  Turns out believing in nothing is  worse. You might as well be dead.  I'm not thrilled with the world, but  I'm not gonna let those idiots start  killing people. Come on, you're a  cop, we've got to get these guys.
He's gotten through to her. She nods in agreement.
They left. To a fortress in the  mountains.
We'll have to go after them.
Aren't you afraid?

A long time ago I learned how to put  fear away in a little place in my  head. Maybe that's my problem. If  you don't feel fear you can do some  amazing things, but you can also  screw your life up in ways you can't  imagine.
I must be healthy, then, because I'm  scared to death. I guess I'd better  get back to Yorgi.
You don't have to do that.
Yes, I do. You're right. I can't  just let him go free. Besides, I can  help you from the inside.
Aren't they gonna wonder were you've  been?
(shrugs) I was supposed to wait for the cop  to kill you and then kill the cop.  They'll believe me. (beat) I've been lying for so long, one  more time won't hurt.
When this is over, we're just gonna  take off, the two of us. Take a  vacation.
What the hell are we doing? We're  doing all this together, trusting  each other, making plans, and we  haven't even slept together yet.
Xander kisses her.
That gives us something to live for.
Together they walk back across the bridge. We crane up,  revealing the PRAGUE PEACE CONFERENCE banners all over a BUILDING on the river.

We see a craggy, gnarly mountain. The front side is a roc strewn, near vertical drop. Then we see Xander come scaling up from the back side. He got GEAR strapped to his back and it looks like it's been helluva climb. Xander sits at the very peak and catches his breath. It's beautiful up here. He pulls a COLLAPSIBLE SNOWBOARD off his back, hits a swi and the thing SWITCHBLADES OUT to full size. He clamps it his feet. Xander moves to the edge and peers down. At the bottom of the mountain he can see the CASTLE, an imposing medieval  fortress in the snow. He leans over the edge and starts d the mountain. He doesn't get far before he notices someth else. He slides to a stop on the near vertical face, clin to rocks for balance. On the mountain below him, between him and the castle, is GUARD OUTPOST. Right now he's in full view and he's been  spotted. He sees GUARDS scrambling out, hopping on  SNOWMOBILES. From up here they look like ants.

Viktor, the goateed cold weather warrior, strides out of Outpost and looks up the mountain. He shouts orders to hi men. A Guard runs up and brings him his weapon: A FLAME-THROWE Viktor straps it on and. climbs onto his SNOWMOBILE. All around him the Guards are driving into position. They form a gauntlet of AK-47's. There must be a DOZEN of them Viktor rides up twenty yards and waits, his engine idling
Hold positions!
He squints up at the speck that is Xander.
Xander pulls a CONCUSSION GRENADE from his jacket.
Nothing like fresh powder.

He puts his goggles on and pulls the pin from the grenade Then he TOSSES IT OVER HIS SHOULDER. The grenade lands in the snow above him and starts ROLLIN DOWNHILL TOWARDS HIM. Xander pushes off and starts bombin down the mountain. The grenade bounces after him and then WHAM! It goes up w a tremendous shock. There is a SHIFT in the snow, a GROAN of shifting weight, then the ENTIRE CORNICE cracks loose and topples over the brink. Xander streaks down the mountain with that wall of snow a his heels. From down below it's an awesome sight. The slack-jawed Gu watch as tons of churning snow bear down on them. Shooting in and out of that powdery mass like a surfer, t can see Xander skipping like a stone down the mountain fa There's a mad scramble as Guards turn their snowmobiles a ride for their lives. A furious Viktor spins around and m a run for it as well. Nobody has a chance. The avalanche is coming like a freig train, frothing like white water. Xander blazes right through the scrambling Guards and hit JUMP. He goes soaring up and lands square on the sloped r of the Outpost. The avalanche is right behind him, slamming down everythi and everyone in its way. Guards are swallowed up and tossed, snowmobiles go tumbli under the onslaught. Xander grabs onto the chimney as the avalanche washes ove the Outpost. He holds on until the ocean of snow comes to stop. Then it's all quiet. Above him the slope is a battlefield of icy rubble. There nothing moving up there anymore. Xander pulls himself fre Then he hears a gushing sound and a DEEP BENEATH THE SURF he sees the WARM ORANGE GLOW OF FLAME. It's Viktor and hi flame thrower. There's another SPURT and the glow fades f good. Xander boards to a rock and sits to catch his breath. He' right above the Castle now. Then his communicator starts BEEP.
(into communicator) Gibbons, long time no talk. You  wouldn't believe my day.

head_text.subj: GIBBONS ON THE PRIVATE JET WITH A TEAM OF

text: What the hell has been going on,  Triple X? How about a status report?
Xander looks down on the Castle. There seem to be MAFIYA  HENCHMEN all over the grounds.
Snow covered fortress. Army of bad  guys. The usual.
I'm on the way with a team to relieve  you. What's the latest?

They retrofitted Ahab with some kind  of rocket launcher. They were loading  canisters of liquid into it, light  colored and dark colored in the same  tube but separate. Something tells  me this it that "classified" stuff  you didn't want me to know about.  Does the song "Silent Night" mean  anything to you?
Yes it does.
Come on, Gibbons, you can do better  then that.

Silent Night is the name of a top  secret binary nerve agent. The glass  canister is shot into the air and  detonated. The black and white  chemicals mix, forming a toxic cloud.  When it settles down to Earth, it'll  kill everything in the vicinity.
Jesus Christ, Gibbons, this is  something we came up with?
Yeah, that's right. So now that you  know, you understand why it's  important that we get it back.
Kinda funny, though, isn't it? We're  not supposed to be making weapons  like that anyway. Guess we shoulda  played by the rules.
Somebody else makes those decisions,  not guys like you and me. You've  done your job, X, head back to Prague.  I'll be landing in 90 minutes. This  is my operation now.
We don't have that kinda time, boss,  I don't think Prague's gonna be around  much longer. I've gotta go now. I've  got a lot of bad guys to kill.
Xander hangs up and heads down the hill.

A GUARD patrols the rocky grounds outside the castle. He  stops for a smoke when Xander walks right up to him. WHACK! With two quick blows he knocks him out and keeps  walking. He's a man on a mission. He runs in a low crouch to the smooth castle wall. There' no hand-holds, it's, a perfectly flat climb. A canyon of  ROCKS is below. Xander reaches into his jacket and pulls out the "TERMINA CLIMBING CLAWS. He pulls on the metal gloves and CLAWS in the solid rock. Just like that he starts scaling the vertical surface. We see him outlined against the mountains, steadily makin this impossible climb. At the top is an overhang. It's a gnarly transition. As h rounding it, his FEET SLIP. His legs dangle over the rock chasm below. Using all his strength, he pulls himself up the rest of t way with his climbing claws. At the top a GUARD leans over, aiming his gun at him. Xan grabs him and pulls him over the edge. The Guard FALLS into the chasm. Xander rolls onto the parapet, exhausted. Then another GU rushes him, grabbing for his rifle. Xander springs, the claws lashing out, and tears the gun  from his hands. With the other hand he SLASHES, taking th Guard down. He pulls off the claws and heads into the Guard Tower.

Xander exits the Guard Tower at the ground level. As he crosses the courtyard an EXPLOSION rocks the tower just left. There is shouting as GUARDS race around the parapets, uns where the attack is coming from. A GUARD runs up to Xande
(in Russian) What's going on?
Xander CLOTHESLINES him and catches his AK-47 as he drops Up inside the castle he can see Yorgi at a window. Yorgi  appears mildly shocked as they make EYE CONTACT. Xander takes aim.

From up above, Kirill has Xander in his sights. BLAW! The bullet hits Xander's AK, sending it spinning. Xander rubs his sore hand but stays put. Kirill could hav killed him and he knows it. From a doorway comes Yorgi wi some Guards. Yorgi walks up and SMASHES Xander in the face.
That was for Anders.
Don't forget goatee boy. I greased  him up on the diamond run.
Yorgi punches him again.
Petra sits at a desk working on a LAPTOP. Yorgi enters wi Xander and Kirill.
Look who we found playing outside.
Petra looks up. She can barely hide her shock.
Petra, my sweet dove, do you notice  anything strange about X? He looks  slightly less than dead.
Kirill aims his gun at Petra.
Yorgi, I thought he was --
Yorgi SLAPS her.

Do you think I didn't know about you  all along? My contacts in the KGB  told me you were coming. You show up  undercover and, I must admit, you  play your part to the hilt. When  it's time to be cruel, you are cruel.  When it's time to be passionate, you  are very very passionate indeed.
Petra is devastated by this revelation.

I could have killed you, but I thought  this would be so much more fun. To  twist you and use you how I see fit.  And to be honest, you went much  farther than I ever expected you  would for your country.
He runs this fingers through her hair and moves on to Xan
And you. Why do you have such a  problem staying away, my friend? Did  you miss us that much?
I wanted to get the hell out of Prague  before Silent Night falls.
Not bad, man, not bad. You put things  together quick. Prague it is.
The Peace conference...
Nice place to start, don't you think?
What's the gimmick, Yorgi? That's  the part I don't get. You gonna hold  the world hostage with your gas bombs?  I didn't think you were dumb enough  to go with that hack cliche.
You think I'm after money? I told  you, my friend. Anarchy. Time for a  change. Money is good, but for true  freedom you have to get rid of the  rules themselves.
So all by yourself, you're going to  destroy every government; in the  world.

Easier than that, buddy. I'll get  them to destroy each other. You kill  an entire Peace conference, someone  is going to have to pay. Then our  friend Ahab continues down the river  to the ocean and begins his world  tour. London, Cairo, Beijing... Pretty  soon everyone's involved. These guys  bomb those guys, those guys invade  these guys. Soon the whole world is  like your wild West cowboy days. No  rules, no law, everybody free to do  what they want.
Including rape, pillage, murder.
Sure, if that's what you want. Why  not? It's all human nature. So we  just have to launch our baby and  wait for the decline and fall of  civilization as we know it.
And here I thought "anarchy" was  just something cool to put on a  Tshirt.
Come on, Xander. You used to stand  for something. What happened to you,  man? I thought you'd get it.
Don't you see, X? For the betterment  of humanity, he's going to start  World War Three.
He's a regular humanitarian. And all  this time I thought he was just a  tool.
You both could have been a part of  it. You could have ridden with us  into a new day, the dawning of a new  age of --
Oh just shoot us already. I'm sorry  I asked.
Yorgi's eye twitches.
Screw you too, buddy.
He raises his gun and suddenly BOOOOOM! A massive explosi rocks the whole castle. Shrapnel shatters the windows,  spraying glass, and Yorgi's shot goes wide.

The front gates have just been blown apart. Through the s and wreckage come Ivans 1 & 2 with a PLATOON OF CRACK CZE SECRET POLICE. Their submachine guns rattle in threeshot  bursts, sweeping Guards from the parapets.

Kirill looks down at the carnage below. Xander takes adva of the distraction and charges at Yorgi. Yorgi goes to shoot but his hand won't work. There's a HU SHARD OF GLASS sticking through his forearm. By the time he pulls it out, Xander is on top of him. He  body checks Yorgi, sending him flying over a desk. Kirill spins and starts FIRING. Xander ducks for cover.
The Czech Secret Police are having their way. They cross courtyard and burst into the main building.

The Police whip through the building like lightening, mow down everyone in their path. One Czech Secret Policeman is wounded and the others reta with a volley of RPG's that evaporates a pocket of resist In the main room upstairs, Kirill is blasting away. Yorgi starts rounding up the computer gear.
Hurry up, kill him!
Before Kirill can do so, Cops burst into the room, sprayi bullets everywhere. Xander and Petra are pinned down, but Yorgi and Kirill ma to make a fast exit out another door.
Hey! We're on your side!
The Cops keep shooting.
Ivan 1 is talking on the radio when Yorgi appears behind and shoots him in the back. They step over him and enter a GARAGE.
The Ahab device is in the back of a flatbed TRUCK. Yorgi Kirill start up the truck and jam it into gear.
The truck smashes through the garage doors and rumbles ac the courtyard. Police open fire, but the truck tears out the gate and st heading down the mountain.
Meanwhile, Xander and Petra are still pinned down.
Petra! Tell them something!
Petra starts calling out in RUSSIAN. Finally the cops sto shooting.
Xander and Petra are brought outside. They see the Police working on the wounded Ivan 1. Ivan 2 walks up.
How's Ivan?
He is okay.
Thanks for coming, man, you guys  were right on time.
We are always on time. Two have  escaped, in truck.
Yorgi and Kirill.
Let me guess, they had a big white  torpedo with them.
Yes. Your friend, the angry one, he  send something for you.
A big truck pulls to a stop. Its ramp lowers and Xander's blown-out '72 GTO comes rolling out.
We'll be right behind you.
Xander and Petra both strap on grenades and pistols.
Did you do your homework?
(nods) If they launch it, I know how to  bring it back.
Let's do this.
They both climb in and the GTO peels out.
Xander drives all out, trying hard to catch up. He passes several of Ivan's Police Jeeps at a furious cli Up ahead they see the truck winding it's way down the  mountain.
Where's he headed?
He owns a big industrial complex on  the river. He'll launch it from there.
Xander floors it. Up ahead, in the flatbed truck, Yorgi drives. He can see GTO gaining on them.
(in Russian, subtitled) They're coming! Get back there.

Kirill loads his sniper rifle and climbs out of the cab. lays down, resting the rifle on the Ahab container. As the GTO comes into view, he sights up and FIRES, WHACK The first shot goes clean through the windshield and blow the headrest off Xander's seat.
You get down! I'll take care of this  fool!
He pulls out an Mp-5 out and hangs it out the window.
No! Don't shoot! He's hiding behind  the nerve agent!
Another shot blasts through, taking off the rear-view mir
Goddamit! He's gonna stop playing  around soon and shoot something  valuable!

Kirill laughs and takes aim once again. He puts Petra in sights. Xander jerks the steering wheel and BLAM! the shot goes w The GTO veers onto a dirt road that cuts down the mountai Xander fights for control as they slide around the turns. The road flattens out and they can see the Industrial Com up ahead. They cut across a field, heading right for it.
The truck heads through the gates of the industrial compl Quickly the gates are closed again. Armed GUARDS can be s up above. The GTO comes at the gates at full speed.
Let's see what my man put together.

Xander opens a DASH PANEL, revealing a ROW OF SWITCHES. H flips one. The HEADLIGHTS EJECT, revealing a MINI-GUN IN EACH FENDER BRRRAAAAAAPPP!! The mini-guns spin. The metal doors are getting SHREDDED. Empty SHELLS spill down the sides of the GTO. The metal doors come apart, falling in chunks. The GTO slams through the wreckage without slowing down. A Guard comes tumbling down and BOUNCES off the trunk as GTO zips inside.

The Anarchy 99 guys seem to have a whole other army in he Guards spill onto the road, shooting at them from everywh A BELLY PANEL on the GTO opens and ping-pong ball sized  MINIBOMBS dump onto the road. BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! The bombs send the Guards scattering. The GTO sizzles away.
Where'd the damn truck go?!
Go to the water, it's that way!
A tactical (a pick-up with a .50 cal machine gun attached pulls up behind them and opens fire.
Toadies right behind.
Let me.

Petra punches another button. The REAR HUBCAPS pop off. They roll along the road on the own. Inside they seem to be LINED WITH SPIKES. As the Tactical pulls up in between the hubcaps they BLOW UP, SPRAYING SPIKES at both sides of the Tactical. All four wheels BLOW OUT and the Tactical goes out of con It crashes through a fence and pitches into the water, th men going sprawling.
Fantastic options.

At the riverbank Yorgi and Kirill pull Ahab off the truck and prepare for launching. They remove it from it's box and carry it waist deep into the water. Yorgi opens a panel and works feverishly on Ah insides.
I've got it, go! Cover me!

Kirill grabs his sniper rifle and heads off. He climbs up to a second story window of a wooden buildin on a WHARF. From here he can shoot and NOT BE SEEN. He ta his LIT CIGARETTE and tucks it behind his ear. When the GTO rounds the corner he FIRES. The bullet goes through the window and SLAMS into the ste column. Xander jams it into reverse. They retreat behind a buildi Petra clutches her arm, wounded.
You okay?
A piece of shrapnel hit me.
I'm sick of that guy. Let's stop  playing nice.

Kirill chambers another bullet and waits for them to make their second approach. The GTO comes roaring out, spinnin in circles wildly. Xander's is just doing donuts as fast he can. Kirill aims, but with all the dust being kicked up he doe have much of a target.
What are you doing!

He doesn't notice Petra pop up from behind a fence with a HEAT SEEKING MISSILE LAUNCHER. ANGLE ON - the missile launcher's COMPUTER SCREEN. The gr display shows a faint red glow in the upstairs window. It the GLOWING POINT of Kirill's lit cigarette. The Launcher BEEPS as it locks in and she FIRES. Kirill looks up to see the missile blazing down the wharf him. He gets it immediately. In a panic he fumbles for the  cigarette... Too late. The missile zeroes in on his head. WHOOOSH! The entire wooden shack blows apart. Xander walks up to Petra.
I guess the surgeon general was right.

ANGLE ON - Ahab as Yorgi flips a switch and let's it go. electric motor purrs to life and Ahab zips out into the r Xander and Petra run to the water's edge in time to see Y escaping in a MOTORBOAT. In the opposite direction they s the ripples of Ahab as it speeds towards it's destination Petra finds the CONTROLLER in the cab of the truck. She  presses buttons desperately.
He's shut out the communication  circuit!
You can't talk to it?
No, it's like a safety. We are going  to have to access the manual controls.
A manual control on a moving torpedo.  This day keeps getting better and  better.
Xander starts running towards a second moored MOTORBOAT.
Radio Ivan! Tell him what's going  down! Have them evacuate downtown!

Yorgi is motoring away, smiling, when he glances back and sees Xander and Petra take off after Ahab. He pounds on h steering wheel and turns around. His bigger boat closes o them and he reloads his weapons. Xander drives while Petra checks her controller.
It's running three meters down. Twenty  knots.
It has to surface to release the  nerve agent, right?
By then it's too late! The only way  to safely dispose of the nerve agent  is in deep water! The chemicals will  break down and dissipate!
Use your grenades! Maybe we can blow  it up underwater!
They're heading into downtown Prague now, the riverbank  getting more and more populated. Yorgi is closing fast. Down below them Petra can see the white streak of Ahab be the water.
There it is! Hold it steady!

Petra pulls the pin on a grenade. She tosses it out in fr of Ahab. WHOOMPH! A jet of water goes up, but too far beh She pulls another pin and is ready to throw when Yorgi's  boat pulls up alongside. Yorgi aims and FIRES and the bul GRAZES Petra's arm.
Petra!

She loses her grip and the grenade bounces down into the  engine compartment. Xander grabs Petra and jumps. Together they land in Yorgi boat. The grenade explodes and their boat slams into a br support and shatters. They are in the heart of the old city now. We see piazza' full of tourists, markets packed with locals, children pl in front of cathedrals. And on the river Yorgi and Xander battle it out while Petra steers the boat.
Xander! It's coming up!

Xander glances down, sees Ahab nearing the surface. Yorgi clobbers him and Xander falls to the edge of the boat. Pe tries to help, but Yorgi slugs her in her wounded arm. Xander can see Ahab just a few inches under as Yorgi grab him from behind in a chokehold.
This is going to be exciting, buddy!  Front row seats to the apocalypse!  Come on, sing with me! (singing madly) "I am an Antichrist / I am an  anarchist / I... wan-na be...  Anarchy!"

Xander elbow's Yorgi's gut and breaks the chokehold. He f him and they both topple overboard. They land on Ahab and both grab on. They punch and pummel each other while desperately hanging on to the speeding  torpedo. It surfaces as it approaches the magnificent St. Charles bridge. On the bridge is a chaos of COPS, FIREMEN and CROWDS OF  PEOPLE. They are desperately trying to herd people away f the river. Xander pounds Yorgi's face and dunks him underwater. Yorg slips and falls back to the tail section, dragging along the torpedo's wake. Ahab starts making noise and it's payload doors swing ope Inside Xander can see the row of glass cannister containi Silent Night. The first one rises up into FIRING POSITION
No you don't.

He pries the first rocket off it's launcher. The thing is BEEPING menacingly. IN SLO-MOTION - Xander blinks at the liquid death in his  hands. He looks over at Petra. She's shouting at him, but doesn't hear a thing but his own HEARTBEAT. He looks the other direction, to the mass of PEOPLE on th bridge above him. Total strangers... The fate of the whole world is in the hands of a former  nihilist. Through the crowd, Xander sees Gibbons break through with his squad of Agents. Gibbons and Xander make eye contact. Then Yorgi lunges onto his back, trying to pull him into water. Xander HITS BUTTONS on the control panel and Ahab  starts to DIVE.

With Yorgi hanging on his back, Xander turns the rocket u down and stuffs it BACK IN THE LAUNCHER. Ahab heads down to the bottom of the river, the two men  fighting. We see one man get THROWN FREE, the other is caught up on Ahab and continues downstream. Then the booster rocket FIRES, giving off SPARKS and BUBB It's all in silhouette now as WHAM! The rocket EXPLODES,  setting off a CHAIN REACTION. WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! Ahab and  it's unfortunate passenger are DISINTEGRATED by the BLAST The chemicals BELCH OUT in harmless clouds.
A FUNNEL OF WATER blasts into the sky. The crowd recoils.

Ivan 2 helps Petra off the motorboat. They look down at t water, but there's no sign of Xander. Gibbons and his men push through the cordon of POLICE,  scanning the water. Nothing. Tears well in Petra's eyes. Even Gibbons looks dejected. Then Petra let's out a gasp and they look downstream. There's a boat ramp leading into the water. At first they see a ripple, then the top of a SHAVED HEAD emerges. The whole crowd looks on as Xander rises from the water,  walking up the boat ramp. His shirt is tattered, his tattooed body battered. But th a look on his face, a calm, a self-confidence we haven't  seen before. The Phoenix has risen. Petra runs down to him and throws her arms around him. Xa shakes Ivan 2's hand and then turns to Gibbons.
Thought you bought the farm down  there, X. Glad as hell to see you.
I'm pretty happy to see me too. So  are you done with me yet?
You've kept up your end of the  bargain, I'll do the same. But you  really should consider staying on,  you make a decent agent.
But I hate cops, remember? Except  for her.
Cut the crap, X, I saw you down there.  You're a hero. Don't be afraid to  join the good guys.
Who says you're the good guys?
He starts walking off with Petra.
You know what they say, the only way  to change the system is from the  inside.
Oh yeah? Why don't we start by taking  this thing off my ankle? The poison  needles?
On come on, X. Did you really think  we were that barbaric?
No needles, huh? What about the acid  bath?
All for show. Just a psychological  mind game to get you to do the right  thing.
(smiles) You're a jerk-off, you know that?
Gibbons waves.
We'll be talking soon, you'll see.  You'll be back.
Xander and Petra move off through the crowd arm in arm.
I can't believe my mission is finally  over. I don't even know what to do  with myself.
You can't welch on me now. We had a  deal.

ANGLE ON - a big "X" spelled out in SEASHELLS on the sand The camera shoots up into the sky, showing a perfect whit beach, a perfect lagoon, a lush green island... BORA BORA Then we hear the BUZZING of a TATTOO NEEDLE.

head_text.subj: A THIRD "X" BEING TATTOOED ON THE BACK OF XANDER'S HEAD.

text: His ink done, Xander walks out onto the back deck.

Craggy mountain peaks and perfect turquoise blue water. Xander steps out of a hut built over the water. We see Petra sprawled out on the deck in a bikini. She's a bucket of HINANO BEER chilling down. It's a vision of  heaven. He lays down next to her, starts pulling her bikini botto off.
(laughing) What are you doing?
It's about your next mission. You  need to be debriefed.

FROM UNDERWATER - we see the two of them dive into the la nude. There's too many bubbles to see any real skin, but know what they're up to. Back on the surface we see BUBBLES rising and catch glimp of their outlines beneath the water. The Camera pulls back to the deck, where we see Xander's  COMMUNICATOR on the table next to the beers. We hear them surface and start SPLASHING off camera. Then the damn communicator starts to BEEP. FADE OUT.
